definition: lacking brightness or color, become sober after excessive alcohol consumption
details:
adjective
- lacking brightness or color
= synonyms: drab
- not affected by a chemical substance, especially alcohol
= example: not affected by a chemical substance, especially alcohol
- dignified and somber in manner or character and committed to keeping promises
= synonyms: grave, sedate, solemn
- completely lacking in playfulness
= synonyms: serious, unplayful
verb
- become sober after excessive alcohol consumption
= example: become sober after excessive alcohol consumption
= synonyms: sober up
- become more realistic
= example: become more realistic
= synonyms: sober up
- cause to become sober
= example: cause to become sober
